Are you sure?

Please read before resetting:

The flashing blue lights times itself by using your device's local time.

In the event that your device's time is inaccurate (even by a second), the blue light will be out of sync.

To fix this issue, you should reload the blue light page several times on a fast Internet so that the page can attempt to get an accurate delay.

For the most optimal result, change your mobile device's time settings to "automatic", so that it will retrieve accurate time from GPS.

Already using automatic time? Disable delay here:



Blue light is still not synced properly after reloading the page a few times? Reset cached delay here:
